microscopes are capable of seeing down to to the most basic structures; atoms.. special massive colliders capable of smashing atoms, and of recording the results, can expose even sub-atomic particles and forces..and yet, not surprisingly, there are no images of any supernatural beings..not so long ago, when modern microscopes were invented, people had no idea of bacterium or other such lifeforms, until the inventor placed a single drop of clean water on his slide, for focusing purposes, and to his surprise, there were millions of tiny organisms swimming around in that clean drop..cellular structure was also one of the first observations made, something todays schoolchildren learn about.. there is just so much knowledge and specific information as to the nature of reality today, from subatomic particles and forces to the expanding universe of billions of galaxies each made up of billions of stars..and yet despite this unprecedented ability to see from within an atom to beyond imaginable distances into the universe,, no ghosts,, no spirits,, no ‚Äúspiritual realms‚Äù‚Ä¶there are,, actual real animals, bears, beyond any doubt,, and yet, there are no bears living in cottages in the woods, making and eating porridge, sleeping in beds, or speaking human languages,, despite countless repetitions of descriptions of talking porridge eating bears, and a little girl going into their house and eating their porridge‚Ä¶similarly there are no ghosts, holy or otherwise.. no spirits, holy or otherwise..in an old castle in england, many people living and working there for ages, swore they had seen the castle ghost, which opened and closed door,, until one day as part of restorations, an engineer measured air pressure variations between levels of the castle,, making adjustments etc, for good air flow etc, which like magic resulted in doors staying open, and not shutting..the ‚Äòghost‚Äô which many had heard, and some ‚Äòseen‚Äô was a variation in air pressure, which was enough to cause doors to shut.. no actual ‚Äòghost‚Äô..and yet there are endless childrens shows on tv, movies, books etc, which have ghosts as characters, which people learn even as little children, and parents often go along with the ruse.. thus ideas are implanted in minds, often from a very early age.. this is a subtle ongoing version of conditioning, old term ‚Äòbrainwashing‚Äô.. and one method whereby some people still have ideas of ghosts and spirits in their minds..aside from those who attend churches, and hear their priests raving on about holy ghosts and holy spirits, and suchlike.. little wonder such question still arise on open forums such as this one..those who create responses to questions about religious ideas, experts in that, actually prefer that nothing can be seen, even with todays finest optical and other technologies.. it makes their angels and devils etc, the more special..also promoting ‚Äòfaith‚Äô which is belief despite knowing something is impossible.. such as turning into an angel and flying to heaven for ever,, thus evading death and dying.. a variation of reincarnation, another religious idea..

Answer: We have known for a long time that objects and substances are composed of smaller parts. Even the Ancient Greeks were able to infer that objects must be made up of smaller units which don‚Äôt necessarily partake of all the properties of the objects they comprise. And although the discoveries made with early microscopes were quite startling, anyone who doubted them could easily make the same experiments for themselves with their own materials. Microscopes essentially just look more closely at objects we already know to be there.I don‚Äôt know what you mean by the ‚Äòworld of form‚Äô, but unlike objectsWe have known for a long time that objects and substances are composed of smaller parts. Even the Ancient Greeks were able to infer that objects must be made up of smaller units which don‚Äôt necessarily partake of all the properties of the objects they comprise. And although the discoveries made with early microscopes were quite startling, anyone who doubted them could easily make the same experiments for themselves with their own materials. Microscopes essentially just look more closely at objects we already know to be there.I don‚Äôt know what you mean by the ‚Äòworld of form‚Äô, but unlike objects in the real world, there is no evidence that a ‚Äòspiritual realm‚Äô even exists. People who talk about such things usually describe them as non-physical, but none of them have been able to explain what it means for a ‚Äònon-physical‚Äô object or location toEven if the people who talk about a ‚Äòspiritual realm‚Äô could agree on what they mean by it, where to look for it, and how to recognise it when we find it, we wouldn‚Äôt be able to ‚Äòsee into‚Äô it with technology or any other way, since seeing requires light, and light is a physical phenomenon. So unless you can explain plausibly how a ‚Äòspiritual realm‚Äô can have any sort of connection with a physical one, I‚Äôm going to assume that it‚Äôs simply part of fantasy fiction, along with Hogwarts, Middle-Earth and Fairyland.

I remember reading an article about French president Francoise Hollande using the public jet to go to private function and there were huge uproar among the local population. Here in Malaysia (Where I came from), the government is suspected of stealing billions, yet you dont get to see huge public uproars at all. There were very little demonstrations and press coverage are literally non existent. Although, when it comes to low corruption, it is not only limited to the west. Japan, Singapore, etc also have very low level of corruption. Im speaking the rest of the world as a whole.
